The best part of the movie I have liked is portraying Ambedkar as a beacon of change. Hitherto religious symbols or hymns or religious books have been used in movies to showcase mending of ways of characters on silver screen. It's a welcome change that a legal luminary was symbolised for reformation. Also, the movie director has symbolically shown that DrAmbedkar is much relevant and he is the need of the hour in the present political and social chaotic situation. The director must be congratulated for his boldness.

In my point of view this film is a gem. It's a underrated masterpiece. One of the best film on this Pandemic. I was wondered why few film blogs including some critics are not focused in this one. When comparing with few worst OTT release films it's a much watch one and also content wise it's a sensational one. With just a very lowest budget & less production values we never imagine a film like this. All credit goes to underrated film maker Bandi Saroj Kumar, a great technician with high potential. He created a sensation and a way to many aspiring film makers who's having content but no support. With his idea few aspiring makers started like this. Especially Telugu film industry need more film makers like Saroj. As a audience I'm telling that this film deserve more attention. Plot point and taking is really excellent. Antharleenangaa unna sandheshaanni ardhamcheskunte e film mind lo nundi konni days podhu. Go for it. Must watch and highly recommended film.

Nirbandam..prior to movie review I would like to review the audience types..there are 3 kinds of audience ..one group is very specific about their kind of cinema..be it comedy , action , fiction and cant enjoy others...second is watch all but very superficially, popcorn movie watchers..and third is true art lovers who can be moved by any sort of film if the content is genuine. This movie is for third category purely...for those kind who got connected to emotion in Satya movie or NH7 not the violence...Nirbandam is purely 18+ movie,its a recent released movie on YouTube directly. By some chance I happened to watch the directors interview first, then the trailer and then the movie..This so far not so famous but technically brilliant director B.saroj kumar who mastered 11 crafts is a gem yet to come to light ..he is the one who directed a critically acclaimed Tamil.movie Porkalam in 2010 mastering 11 crafts.. if u watch the trailer alone most would be come to a conclusion half way thro that it's a attention seeking c grade film...but if u take patience to watch the full trailer and extend the same unbiased mind to watch this 80 min movie u would come out with a heartwrenching story haunting you...its strictly not for those who cannot tolerate cuss words and see the intention behind using such language to depict the truth in raw form. There is not a single frame which is visually disturbing or banking on skin show which is expected by most watching the trailer. The director shows what draws young minds to crime since childhood in a very subtle way without any direct dialogue about it...be it the way they r brought up on streets, child marriage and poor supervision of kids, engaging them since childhood in such activities, criminal psyche,their opinion about women and brainwashing others with their philosophy, unemployment, bad company not realizing that they r messing with someone's lives...its the intention of the direction that drew me to the movie..if u can survive the first 15 min unbiased then will watch the rest with an open mind.. Do watch it, nirbhayanga nirbhandam choodandi..let me know the feedback too.

Honest Film making.. Every aspect was Depicted in most realistic approach and yet staying away from Nudity. Is what Defines your approach and responsibility towards society.Language or Dialect used is apt to the scene and the charecters , in its most natural form Climax stands out...I have watched and payed..Though an art form can't be measured in commercial terms,BUT SURVIVAL of such film-making needs it.All the best and come up with most exciting content. As an Aspiring Filmmaker would like to see you Doing Different genres.. Porkalam shot composition is what we are looking forward to see from you...
